apple.Apple Scab: Use fungicides like Captan or Mancozeb. Prune infected leaves.
apple.Black Rot: Apply copper-based fungicides. Remove infected fruit.
apple.Cedar Apple Rust: Use fungicides with myclobutanil. Plant resistant varieties.
apple.Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper watering and nutrients.

potato.Late Blight: Use systemic fungicides like Metalaxyl. Remove infected plants.
potato.Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper soil drainage.

bell_pepper.Bacterial Spot: Use copper-based sprays and avoid overhead watering. Remove infected leaves.
bell_pepper.Healthy: No treatment needed. Ensure proper air circulation.

cherry.Powdery Mildew: Apply sulfur or potassium bicarbonate-based fungicides. Prune affected areas.
cherry.Healthy: No treatment needed. Avoid excessive humidity.

corn.Cercospora Leaf Spot: Apply strobilurin or triazole fungicides. Improve field sanitation.
corn.Common Rust: Use resistant hybrids. Apply fungicides if severe.
corn.Northern Leaf Blight: Apply fungicides with mancozeb or chlorothalonil. Rotate crops.
corn.Healthy: No treatment needed. Ensure good soil health.

grape.Black Rot: Apply fungicides like myclobutanil or mancozeb. Remove infected grapes.
grape.Esca (Black Measles): Use fungicides containing pyraclostrobin. Prune affected vines.
grape.Leaf Blight: Apply copper-based fungicides. Improve vineyard ventilation.
grape.Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain balanced irrigation.

tomato.Bacterial Spot: Use copper sprays. Avoid handling plants when wet.
tomato.Early Blight: Apply fungicides with chlorothalonil. Remove affected leaves.
tomato.Late Blight: Use systemic fungicides like Metalaxyl. Destroy infected plants.
tomato.Septoria Leaf Spot: Use fungicides with chlorothalonil. Space plants properly for airflow.
tomato.Yellow Leaf Curl Virus: Control whiteflies with insecticidal soap. Use resistant varieties.
tomato.Healthy: No treatment needed. Maintain proper fertilization.
